name: hu4BF398
comments: Age is turning hair white.  Body hair is still blond.

name: hu60180F
comments: I was a light blond and then turned to an ash blond

name: huA05317
comments: was much lighter at birth, darkened within a year.

name: hu6C733E
hair_detailed: Salt and pepper (dark brown and gray)
comments: My hair was dark brown at birth but is now graying.

name: hu627574
comments: I was a blond as a child, my hair turned light brown around 12 and had some red/gold in it, then in my 20's turned a bit darker.  I started getting some gray hair around 26 and I am almost all gray at 55.

name: huC14AE1
hair_detailed: Dark blonde, nearing light brown in color.
comments: When younger, my hair was considerably lighter--almost a towhead, particularly in the summer.  As I aged, my hair darkened considerably and does not bleach in the light like it used to.

name: hu76CAA5
comments: Typical brunette. Lighter brown as a child, darkening as I aged until appearance of first gray in circa age 40. Very grey now at age 62 (my hair is almost as grey as my 90 year old mother). Oddly, my younger brother at age 60 has very little grey.

name: huF83462
comments: grayish blonde

name: huC5733C
comments: Bright blonde when young, became dirty blonde, now almost white.

name: hu599905
comments: Before beginning to gray, my hair was dark brown with a hint of red. I would call it brown, not auburn. However, my sideburns and bear were distinctly red. Everything is gray enough now that no red tones are noted at all.

name: hu8E2A35
comments: Same color as long as I can remember

name: huB4940E
comments: Same color as when I was a baby

name: hu620F18
comments: Born with curly red hair that was a deep cherry red, not orange.  It lightened to a honey blonde, then went brown as I aged.

name: hu602487
hair_detailed: White in front, grey mixed with light brown behind.
comments:
As a baby and toddler I had very light blond hair -- it looks white in photos. 
It darkened to dark blond by my 20's, with lighter blond in the front (naturally). 

It stayed that way until it began to go grey, then the rest darkened to brown and grey.

name: huB1488D
comments: I was born with blonde hair. It took on both a darker and more reddish hue at about age 13-14. My hair began turning gray at age 23.

name: hu016B28
hair_detailed: brown with grey in the temples

name: hu79F922
comments: Towhead at age 2 to age 12. Now mousy, formerly blond, light brown. Gray around edges.

name: huD09534
comments: I was born with white hair, and was VERY blond till my early twenties, but it doesn't describe my siblings so I don't know how to explain it

name: hu7A2F1D
comments: I was born with blond hair that turned to brown and started turning gray in my 50s and white in my 60s. My eyebrows are still brown but turning gray.

name: hu60AB7C
comments: My hair seems to have come from my mother who also had very thin hair strands.  Both my Mother and Paternal Grandmother seem to have suffered from a degree of mercury poisoning from Gamma 2 Amalgam fillings.  My paternal grandmother suffered from what appeared to be the uniform loss of about 2/3 of her hair, and grey hair, perhaps from mercury poisoning.  The hairline on my forehead receded while I was homeless, keeping my hair in a pony tail, and unable to wash it regularly.  It has stopped receding since returning to proper hygiene.

name: hu470099
hair_detailed: Dark Brown, often mistaken for black
comments: Born with lighter brown hair, darkened with age, grey coloration started in 20's an has slowly progress with age

name: huA49E22
hair_detailed: it's brown; perhaps a little lighter than the "average" brown hair.

name: hu448C4B
comments: Born bald. Not balding now, at age 65. Was dark blonde.

name: hu72C17A
comments: black

name: hu0E7AAF
comments: very blonde at least until a few years old, less and less as I got older
